Class RotationComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.ents.AbstractComponent
      • com.almasb.ents.component.DoubleComponent
        • com.almasb.fxgl.entity.component.RotationComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class RotationComponent
extends com.almasb.ents.component.DoubleComponent
implements com.almasb.ents.CopyableComponent<RotationComponent>
    Adds rotation data to an entity.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • rotateBy

        public final void rotateBy(double byAngle)
        Rotate entity view by given angle. Note: this doesn't affect hit boxes. For more accurate collisions use PhysicsComponent.
        Parameters:
        byAngle - rotation angle in degrees

      • rotateToVector

        public final void rotateToVector(javafx.geometry.Point2D vector)
        Set absolute rotation of the entity view to angle between vector and positive X axis. This is useful for projectiles (bullets, arrows, etc) which rotate depending on their current velocity. Note, this assumes that at 0 angle rotation the scene view is facing right.
        Parameters:
        vector - the rotation vector / velocity vector

      • angleProperty

        public final javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty angleProperty()
